resources.string: Here, the buttons on the media player would use the Android multimedia framework to play files on the user\'s phone.
Here, I would have an intent that would lead the user from clicking on a playlist to a list of its songs. From there, a user could click on a song to start playing it.
Here, I would have an intent to that would lead the user from clicking on the artist to a generated list of their songs.
Here, I would have an intent to that would lead the user from clicking on the album to a generated list of its songs.
Here I would have an intent to would lead the user from clicking on a song to playing it.
